inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no difficulties or need for help in performing self-care or instrumental activities of daily living

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: able to walk for at least 400 meters

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: valid Clinical Center Medical Record Number

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: diagnosis of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) is confirmed

notes: The patient has a history of RRMS and underwent brain MRI which revealed plaques in the brainstem and left cerebral hemisphere. She is currently under treatment for RRMS.
